name: Arch Virtual HQ
description:
You're invited to visit Arch Virtual HQ for Oculus Rift and HTC Vive. After exploring our virtual office, choose from a variety of destinations to visit, including a residential condominium architectural visualization, an operating room with a 3D scanned patient for medical simulation, and an interactive oil rig.

This demo of our services also features our multi-player system, Immerse Collaborative. If you would like a passcode to meet with one of our representatives to discuss a potential project, please use the sign-up form below.
